products.name: Teddy Bear
products.description: Meet your new favorite cuddle buddy! Our Cuddly Brown Teddy Bear is the perfect companion for both children and adults alike. Standing at 12 inches tall, this adorable teddy bear is made from ultra-soft, high-quality plush material that’s perfect for hugging and snuggling.
